alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 07 at 3:32PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central Colorado, east central Colorado and southeast Colorado, including the following areas, Pikes Peak and Teller County, and El Paso, Crowley, Kiowa, Otero, Prowers, Bent, Pueblo and Western Las Animas Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Monsoon moisture combined with post-frontal upslope winds will increase the risk of heavy rain producing thunderstorms and flash flooding across the area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
